column4: trey: you could always write a bot that lurked here, listened for people complaining about configure issues, and told them to install auto-apt :)
kinda humbling, it was
yeah, he's me
I've seen you drink, he's not like you either :)
heh! whisky bof, or other?
I paid for your hotel & ols
yeah :) it's not like it was at all damaged
unlike, say, your head that morning? :)
oh man, yeah.  at least I was lucid enough to greet you ;)
heh.  Actually, that was the first year I was sensible, and didn't completely go blotto at the afterparty
yeah, I totally missed the afterparty
yeah, I remember; you had to go to the states with the RH guys, right?
not really, it was more that I decided that there were very many good things for me to do that day, and drink more wasn't one of them
... i never danced on any tables.
and now's not the time to start :)
exactly.
leave! you'll be here all day, otherwise!
almost
just waiting to drag all the photos off the cf card on to my laptop before I go, so I have room
yeah, 256MB's the objective here
yeah, that's aboot right, eh? :)
too right, mate! :)
